attributes.action: a school bus for every school
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I spend 45-60 minutes every day going to school and 45-60 mintues travelling back, waiting for the buses in the cold and walking to and from buses stops. I think we should change this now! 

I think there should be a school bus in the most popular area, chosen by the schoolkids and the school bus goes and drops us off to school every day! 

This will keep us from waiting every day in the cold weather of britain and will also make sure that everyone is not late to school.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
